responses: Hi there, how can I help?

DealMagik was started in 2022 when the founders felt that the current Marketplace platforms are not really helping businesses much, once the associated costs are factored in. DealMagik offers businesses a platform to run their business and a marketplace to promote their business. For consumers, it provides a unified portal to find great deals and bundle additional items.
Hard working team memebers are so good

patterns: How do I Contact DealMagik Consumer Support?
responses: There are 2 ways to contact our Support team 1. Call our Consumer Support Hotline - 973-265-0720 2. On the bottom is a Contact Us link - please submit with as much detail as you can provide

patterns: Tell me more about flash deal
responses: Flash Deals are Same Day Final Sale deals only. All sales are final. Returns and Refunds are not possible.
